title: Isn't your mind just FULL of questions about life, living, death, and everything surrounding life? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes, and more… I am a truth seeker; I follow my inner wisdom most of the time on my journey as a truth seeker. I am not that far on the path to trying to be more aware of my self and others as well. I like to understand what is that is : this questioning brings me closer to realizing that I dont know much; that there is so much more to comprehend. I enjoy this journey of finding a little more and more who I am; thus finding out also who We are at the same time. I wish all of us be motivated on their journey; learning more and more and , having pleasure doing so. It is a matter of taking some time and giving some attention to What There Is. roland

Isn't your mind just FULL of questions about life, living, death, and everything surrounding life? Certainly not if one keeps one’s mind occupied with: Helping others. Reading uplifting poetry. Studying Stars. Listening to Good Music. Enjoying Humor. Watching sports. Playing tennis. Spend time with good friends. Admiring stars and constellations. Browsing through Classical literature. Cheer up and be well! JOPO TIOLI. Peace in so many ways! 25 Sept 2018
